Name: no
Description: either dominant object-subject order or no dominant order

Name: yes
Description: dominant word order is subject-first (including SVO and SOV orders)

Name: no
Description: dominant wordo order order is not subject-first (including verb-initial and object-initial orders)

Name: yes
Description: there is overt morphological marking of lexical arguments (subject and/or object)

Name: no
Description: there is no overt marking of lexical arguments (subject and object)

Name: yes
Description: there is head marking of lexical arguments (subject and/or object)

Name: no
Description: there is no head marking of lexical arguments (subject and object)

Name: yes
Description: there is dependent marking of lexical arguments (subject and/or object)

Name: no
Description: there is no dependent marking of lexical arguments (subject and object)
